title: Switch app and marketing headers to new monochrome logo assets

requirements.summary: Update authenticated app header to use new monochrome logos with theme-aware src, correct alt text, and 80px rendered height.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx`, the header logo `` uses `src="/logo-mono-white.png"` when the resolved theme is light and `src="/logo-mono-dark.png"` when the resolved theme is dark.
The logo is displayed at 80px height and preserves aspect ratio (width auto).
The light-mode logo `alt` text is exactly "EcoPowerHub AI" and the dark-mode logo `alt` text is exactly "EcoPowerHub AI (dark)".

file_operations.description: Adjust the header logo rendering to (1) select `/logo-mono-white.png` vs `/logo-mono-dark.png` based on `resolvedTheme`, (2) set `alt` to exactly `EcoPowerHub AI` in light mode and `EcoPowerHub AI (dark)` in dark mode, and (3) render the logo at 80px height with automatic width (preserve aspect ratio). If needed to avoid clipping, update the header container sizing to accommodate an 80px-tall logo without overflow.

requirements.summary: Update marketing header to use new monochrome logos with theme-aware src, correct alt text, and 80px rendered height.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/MarketingHeader.tsx`, the logo `` uses `/logo-mono-white.png` in light mode and `/logo-mono-dark.png` in dark mode (using existing theme logic).
The marketing header logo is displayed at 80px height and preserves aspect ratio (width auto).
The rendered logo `alt` text matches the same strings as the app header: "EcoPowerHub AI" (light) and "EcoPowerHub AI (dark)" (dark).

file_operations.description: Replace the current marketing logo `` with a theme-aware logo that uses `/logo-mono-white.png` for light mode and `/logo-mono-dark.png` for dark mode (prefer `resolvedTheme` from the existing `next-themes` hook to handle `system`). Set `alt` to exactly `EcoPowerHub AI` (light) and `EcoPowerHub AI (dark)` (dark). Render the logo at 80px height with automatic width (preserve aspect ratio), and adjust header layout sizing if required to prevent clipping.
